self.name: channels.updateUsername
self.descriptionExcerpt: Change the username of a supergroup/channel

throws.description: You're admin of too many public channels, make some channels private to change the username of this channel
throws.name: CHANNELS_ADMIN_PUBLIC_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED

throws.description: You can't write in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_WRITE_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The provided username is not valid
throws.name: USERNAME_INVALID

throws.description: The provided username is already occupied
throws.name: USERNAME_OCCUPIED
